blogPost.excerpt: The Crown guides you into a focused state and helps you stay there. It aligns your brainwaves in the right patterns for your optimal flow. Discover the songs that expedite your flow and help you find the zone using the Neurosity app with your Spotify account.
blogPost.body: The Crown guides you into a focused state and helps you stay there. It aligns your brainwaves in the right patterns for your optimal flow. Discover the songs that expedite your flow and help you find the zone using the Neurosity app with your Spotify account.
blogPost.title: Crown™ - Shift into focus
blogPost.author: Alex Castillo

localize.description: 皇冠引导你进入专注状态，并帮助你保持这种状态。它以正确的模式调整您的脑电波，以达到最佳流程。使用带有Spotify账户的Neurosity应用程序，发现能够加快您的流动并帮助您找到区域的歌曲。
皇冠引導你進入專注狀態，並幫助你保持這種狀態。它以正確的模式調整您的腦電波，以達到最佳流程。使用帶有Spotify賬戶的Neurosity應用程序，發現能夠加快您的流動並幫助您找到區域的歌曲。

previous.excerpt: Idenati is designed to simplify your experience, to organize everything you do online in one place, allowing you to focus and be more productive.
previous.title: Idenati - Organize everything you do online in one place

localize.description: Idenati的设计是为了简化您的体验，将您在网上做的所有事情组织在一个地方，让您集中精力，提高工作效率。
localize.tagline: 在一个地方组织您的所有在线活动

localize.description: Idenati的設計是爲了簡化您的體驗，將您在網上做的所有事情組織在一個地方，讓您集中精力，提高工作效率。
localize.tagline: 在一個地方組織您的所有在線活動

localize.description: MarketPlan新的视频和图片协作功能允许您和您的营销团队或客户通过简单的点击和拖动来上传、协作、评论您的营销资产。本周我们还在网站上开通了https://marketplan.io/?ref=producthunt&utm_source=Product%20Hunt&utm_campaign=Product%20Hunt%20Image%20Video%20Collaboration%20Launch&utm_medium=Post&utm_content=Post%20Description%20Link。
localize.tagline: 规划、计划、项目、分析和优化您的营销。

localize.description: MarketPlan新的視頻和圖片協作功能允許您和您的營銷團隊或客戶通過簡單的點擊和拖動來上傳、協作、評論您的營銷資產。本週我們還在網站上開通了https://marketplan.io/?ref=producthunt&utm_source=Product%20Hunt&utm_campaign=Product%20Hunt%20Image%20Video%20Collaboration%20Launch&utm_medium=Post&utm_content=Post%20Description%20Link。
